name: easy4ipshow
0:
”Alexa, show me the front door camera.”
”Alexa, show me the living room camera.”
”Alexa, show me the kitchen room camera .”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: When you want to see the Dahua real-time surveillance video, you can say to echo show: "Alexa, show the front door camera ." Then you can see the Dahua surveillance video from the echo show.
